pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, April 2, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 12:00 p.m.

5:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a National Caucus meeting.

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks.

Room 225A
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

Toronto, Ontario

8:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the United Jewish Appeal Top Gifts Dinner, and will deliver remarks.

The Westin Harbour Castle
1 Harbour Square

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive through the main entrance at 1 Harbour Square (Queens Quay entrance), and report to the Pier 6 Room, Second Floor, no later than 8:15 p.m.
  • Media are asked to register by 10:00 a.m. on Tuesday, April 2, with perlich@ujafed.org
